chunk:
The Yellow Bird Argan Face Oil (2020 formulation)

Brand: The Yellow Bird

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: 100% Pure Cold-Pressed Argan Oil, Frankincense Essential Oil, Lavender Essential Oil

Directions: Apply 1-3 pumps to a clean, damp face. Massage it in and allow it to absorb for 1-3 minutes. Store out of direct sunlight.
book: 1989-The Yellow Bird Argan Face Oil (2020 formulation)

chunk:
Directions: Apply 1-3 pumps to a clean, damp face. Massage it in and allow it to absorb for 1-3 minutes. Store out of direct sunlight.

Warnings: : For external use only. If skin becomes irritated, wash off immediately. Avoid direct contact with eyes or mouth. Do not ingest. Discontinue use if skin becomes irritated.
book: 1989-The Yellow Bird Argan Face Oil (2020 formulation)

chunk:
